giftR 0.2.0

Secret Santa Gift Exchange

secret_santa.Rd

Assigns a secret santa to each participant and sends them an email with their assignment.

Usage

secret_santa(
  names,
  emails,
  sender_name = "Secret Santa Bot",
  sender_email,
  subject = "Your Secret Santa Assignment",
  smtp_password_env_var = "SMTP_PASSWORD",
  smtp_provider = "gmail",
  ...
)

Arguments

names

A character vector of participant names.

emails

A character vector of participant email addresses. Must be the same length as names.

sender_name

The name of the sender (e.g., "Secret Santa Organizer").

sender_email

The email address to send from.

subject

The subject line of the email.

smtp_password_env_var

The name of the environment variable containing the SMTP password. Defaults to "SMTP_PASSWORD".

smtp_provider

The SMTP provider. Defaults to "gmail".

...

Additional arguments passed to blastula::smtp_send().

Value

Invisible NULL. Prints a message upon completion.
